text:
Hei, I use FOP 0.20.1 to generate PDF. I found that in each page sequence, we 
miss the line(made by <fo:leader>) in running head for the first 3 pages. While 
following pages are OK.
When I test with FOP 0.18.1. All pages are OK. SO I think it's a 0.20.1 bug.
Thanks.
creator: jz.Ouyang@iuniverse.com.cn
jz.Ouyang@iuniverse.com.cn
text:
Created attachment 498
This is the test file.

The test case renders as expected with 0.20.3, with the exception of the
last (forced blank) page.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
oleg@tkachenko.com
text: Looks fine using 0.20.4, even last forced page.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
